response.summary:
Data Engineer with a strong background in Python, SQL, Git and Terraform. Certified Cloud Practitioner with expertise in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and a deep understanding of ETL processes. Passionate about leveraging data-driven insights to optimize business operations and drive informed decision-making.

I hold a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from Universidad Nacional de Colombia, where I gained a solid foundation in software development principles and practices. This educational background, combined with my hands-on experience in data engineering, allows me to bridge the gap between software engineering and data-driven solutions.

I also hold an AWS Cloud Practitioner certificate, which demonstrates my comprehensive understanding of cloud computing concepts and services and experience in managing cloud-based data solutions.

I am constantly seeking opportunities to enhance my skill set and stay updated with the latest industry trends. My dedication to continuous learning and professional growth fuels my passion for delivering high-quality solutions.
response.skills: Front-End Development, Research Skills, Python (Programming Language), Terraform, Extract, Transform, Load (ETL), Amazon Web Services (AWS), Cloud Computing, Cloud Services, AWS cloud, AWS, Cloud Platform, Strategic Planning, Engineering, Research, Analytical Skills, Software Development, Front-end Development, Software Architecture, Data Structures, JavaScript

company.name: Seguros Bolivar S.A
company.description:
Somos una Compañía Aseguradora orgullosamente Colombiana, fundada en 1939. 
Con más de 70 años de experiencia en el mercado Colombiano, ofrecemos una gran variedad de Programas de Protección Integral para ti y para tu familia.
Formamos parte del Grupo Bolívar, el tercer grupo financiero de Colombia.
